titleStmt.title: An infallible vvay to farewell in our bodies, names, estates, precious souls, posterities : together with, mens great losse of happinesse, for not paying, the small quitrent of thankfulness : whereunto is added remaines of the P.A., a subject also of great concernment for such as would enjoy the blessed promises of this life, and of that ot come / by R. Younge ...
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M., and are to be sold by James Crumpe ... and Henry Cripps ...,

notesStmt.note: "The sad and doleful lamentation of Origen after his fall": with caption title, 10 p. at end.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
